## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change

## Safety Checklist (if clinical logic changed)

- [ ] Drug interaction rules unaffected
- [ ] Contraindication checks unaffected
- [ ] Dosage calculations unaffected
- [ ] Audit logging preserved
- [ ] All safety tests pass

## Testing

- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing performed
